channel.title: game on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in game on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-01
item.description: Apple’s big iPhone update lets you FaceTime with Windows and Android users â€” here’s how (2 minute read) Apple’s iOS 15 update lets iPhone users invite Windows and Android users to FaceTime calls.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-20
item.description: Peloton plans to launch an in-app video game where you pedal to control a rolling wheel (2 minute read) Lanebreak is Peloton’s new in-app video game that involves riders changing their cadence and resistance to meet goals and control an on-screen rolling wheel.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-18
item.description: Amazon is in talks to buy MGM for $9 billion (2 minute read) Amazon has reportedly offered $9 billion to purchase MGM, the film giant that owns a historic catalog of films, an array of production and distribution companies, and the content network Epix.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-17
item.description: Microsoft to launch xCloud streaming free with Xbox Game Pass Ultimate in September (6 minute read) Microsoft will launch xCloud free to its Xbox Game Pass Ultimate subscribers in September.
